version_description: Hotfix: Fixed some recently found bugs. Improved overall stability and performance. Let's play!
Hotfix: Fixed some recently found bugs. Improved overall stability and performance. Let's play!

A new update is out and there are some new faces in Lootopia!

Introducing BUDDIES. Every hero needs a side kick… or several. Unlock all the buddies to gain their perks! Think strategically and equip the right one:
